grade_comment:
Grade: 85

Comment: The student provides a solid explanation of the metaphor of the cornerstone in Christianity and its application to the relationship between Jesus and His followers. They correctly point out the foundational role of Jesus in the faith and how he unifies believers. The reference to Jesus shaping the lives and values of his followers is also well-stated. The student demonstrates a good understanding of the metaphor and its implications for Christian belief and practice.
